CCXMP

Class CCXMPTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • CCXMP.CCXMPTag

  • public class CCXMPTag
extends java.lang.Object
    Creative Commons license tagging class
    This class uses Adobe XMP Library for Java CS6
    This class uses Wen Yu's PixyMeta Android (Metadata part of iCafe) Tutorial of this class is available at CCXMPTag Tutorial
    Version:
    0.1 03/27/2015
    Author:
    Hosung Hwang, ho-sung.hwang@senecacollege.ca

    • Method Detail

      • extractInfo

        public boolean extractInfo(java.lang.String filename)
                    throws adobe.xmp.XMPException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Extracts XMP tag from image files.
        Parameters:
        filename - image file name. jpg, png, tif
        Returns:
        true if there is no exception
        Throws:
        adobe.xmp.XMPException - wrap all XMP related exceptions
        java.io.IOException - file related exceptions

      • extractInfoFromXML

        public boolean extractInfoFromXML(java.lang.String xmlString)
                           throws adobe.xmp.XMPException
        Extracts License info from XMP string
        Parameters:
        xmlString - XMP string
        Returns:
        true if no parsing error
        Throws:
        adobe.xmp.XMPException - wrap all XMP related exceptions

      • existValue

        public boolean existValue(java.lang.String tagName)
        Checks if the cc license value is exist in XMP tag
        Parameters:
        tagName - Supported tag name : CCXMPTag.TAG_XXXXXXX
        Returns:
        true if the value exist, false if not exist

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue(java.lang.String tagName)
        Get CC license value from tag name.
        Parameters:
        tagName - Supported tag name : CCXMPTag.TAG_XXXXXXX
        Returns:
        tag value string

      • deleteValue

        public boolean deleteValue(java.lang.String tagName)
        Deletes license entry
        Parameters:
        tagName - Supported tag name : CCXMPTag.TAG_XXXXXXX
        Returns:
        true if success

      • setNewValue

        public boolean setNewValue(java.lang.String tagName,
                           java.lang.String value)
        Set CC license values by tag name
        When tagName is CCXMPTag.TAG_LICENSE, this method automatically generate "Marked" tag and "UsageTerms" tag based on value. Therefore, to set custom "UsageTerms" tag, it should be set after setting CCXMPTag.TAG_LICENSE
        Parameters:
        tagName - Supported tag names are CCXMPTag.TAG_XXXXXXX
        value - string values. When the tagName is CCXMPTag.TAG_LICENSE, value should be supported license : CCXMPTag.LICENSE_XXXX, and automatically generate and put proper Marked and UsageTerms tag values
        Returns:
        True if successfully set values

      • writeInfo

        public boolean writeInfo(java.lang.String srcFilename,
                         java.lang.String destFilename)
                  throws adobe.xmp.XMPException,
                         java.io.IOException
        This writes current license to an image file
        Parameters:
        srcFilename - source file name
        destFilename - destination file name
        Returns:
        true if succeeded
        Throws:
        adobe.xmp.XMPException - wrap all XMP related exceptions
        java.io.IOException - file related exceptions

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        return existing license values
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
